question: Mike's Mechanics . Can I help you ?
Yes , how do I get to your shop from Chilin ?
Go straight up Zhongshan Road and you will see our sign on your right , after you pass the museum .
gold: Thank you very much .

question: Hi ! This is Tome Smith .
Yes , Mr . Smith ?
Is my VCR ready ?
gold: No , it will be another hour .

question: Hello , is John in ?
No , he's not . May I take a message ?
Yes , would you leave him a message to call me ?
gold: Yes , what's your name ?

question: I'd like to talk to Mr . White please ?
He stepped out of the office for a little while .
When is a good time to catch him ?
gold: In about twenty minutes .

question: It looks to be a nice day today .
Good , let's go for a drive .
Okay , I'll get the car out of the garage .
gold: Great .

question: What did you do today ?
Played poker with my work friends .
Did you win ?
gold: Of course .

question: First you add the washing powder then you add the clothes .
I take it you've done this before ?
Yes , for the last 20 years .
gold: Good .

question: Anna , Would you like to dance ?
I ’ d love to , but I ’ m a terrible dancer . I ’ m afraid I may step on your toes .
Don ’ t worry about it . I ’ ll show you how . It ’ s a piece of cake .
gold: Thank you . I ’ ll try my best .

question: I come home for lunch .
How long have you got ?
Only 1 hour .
gold: Okay , I'll make you some food .

question: Do you mind if I get a lift in your car , please ?
I don ’ t see any problem ; only the car is a bit old .
Oh you ’ re so kind !
gold: Get in .

question: I like these shoes .
Do you realize that all these shoes are half off ?
Really ?
gold: Yes , but the offer only lasts this week .

question: Good morning , Mary .
How do you want your egg cooked ?
Sunny side up , please .
gold: Okay , it'll be ready in two minutes .

question: Can you shorten this pipe for me ? It's too long .
Sure . I'll do it after lunch . What length do you need ?
Can you take 15 mm of it ?
gold: Yes , no problem . It'll be ready by 2 p . m .

question: Oops !
What happened ?
I overcooked the corn .
gold: That's okay . I like it better that way anyway .

question: Please take me to Plaza Hotel .
OK . When should we be there ?
As soon as possible , because I've got an important meeting to attend .
gold: All right , if there's no hold-ups .

question: Now that we know what kind of music we will play , we have to decide what each of us will do .
Well , I love hip hop dancing , so I should probably dance . Do you know how to rap ?
Oh yeah ! I'm a great rapper . And I know all the Vanilla Ice lyrics by heart .
gold: Excellent . I'll start practicing my dance moves .

question: What would you like ?
We'd like to have western food today . Could you tell us something about it ?
Sure . The first food you have is appetizer , followed by a soup . Then you will have the main course . The last dishes are desserts .
gold: Well , it's quite different from the Chinese food .

question: Good evening , may I help you ?
Yes . I want to reserve a table for two this evening .
I am sorry , madam . All the tables are booked now .
gold: Well . In that case , we will have to go to another restaurant . Thank you all the same .

question: Is there a vacant table for two now ?
Yes , sir , let me show you the table . This way please .
Well , we would like to sit over there . Is that all right ?
gold: Of course .

question: Let's catch the waiter's eyes . We want to have a table for 4 .
What about that one ?
Well , it's too close to the door . Is that table reserved ?
gold: No , sir . You can sit where you like .

question: Have you got any outdoor interests ?
Yes . My only recreation is skateboarding .
Oh , I know it . It is included in extreme sports . I think it's too dangerous for me .
gold: Maybe . But it emphasizes participation and a spirit of courage , and can give one the extreme sense of cheerfulness and success . I'm getting to like the game more and more .

question: Does this TV work well ?
Yes , it is almost new here .
Is it a color TV or a black and white TV ?
gold: It is a color TV . You know , the rich people like the digital one now . So they have no room for them .

question: Have you ever climbed the mountain before ?
Never . But I have been looking forward to it for quite a long time .
Now your dream comes true . Do you know the altitude of the mountain ?
gold: It's 2065 meters . Come on . Let us keep up the pace .

question: Can you offer me something a little cheaper ?
Well , let me see . What price range do you have in mind ?
I want to stay under $ 20 .
gold: How about this one ? This is just $ 20 . It's worth every penny of it .

question: Sir , how can I help you ?
I'd like a one-inch photo for my interview .
OK , please take a seat . Look at here . Head up . Done .
gold: I want to fetch them in 3 days .

question: What do you need me to do ?
Will you please copy these diplomas tor me ?
Sure . How many copies do you need ?
gold: 15 copies for each diploma .

question: Are you ready to order ?
Yes . I'll have the fresh fruit cocktail .
And for your entree ?
gold: I think I'll Ty the crisp deep-fried chicken .

question: How much are these in all ?
It comes to $ 40 .
Here is my member card . Can I have someone carry those bags to my car ?
gold: Of course . I will find you one .

question: I'm sorry , but I didn't catch what you said .
I said , " Do you want me to help you ? "
If you're sure you're not in a hurry , I can use a little help .
gold: OK . Would you like me to get you a cab ?

question: Good morning , miss .
Good morning , I'd like a haircut .
How would you like it ?
gold: Just a trim will do .

question: Excuse me , can I have a look at the green coat ?
Certainly . Here you are . It's a new arrival .
Yes , I like the style.Can I try this on ?
gold: Sure . The fitting room is in the corner .

question: Do you like the cookies ?
I finished them in no time .
Glad you like it .
gold: Mum , when will we have them again ?

question: Traffic rules are different among countries .
For example ?
People drive on the right in China .
gold: Oh , that's interesting !

question: I'm afraid I forgot to lock the door .
You're so careless , Billy .
Sorry , Mum , I'll lock it right away .
gold: I've done it for you .

question: What is the proper way to sit at a dinner table ?
Ideal posture is to sit straight , but not stiff , against the back of the chair .
Yes .
gold: Hands , when one is not actually eating , may be in the lap . Tipping one's chair is unforgivable .

question: This is the rush hour .
I noticed there ’ s a jam a few blocks away .
Let ’ s drive off this road .
gold: I ’ m afraid I ’ ll be late .

question: This is the rush hour .
I noticed there ’ s a jam a few blocks away .
Let ’ s drive off this road .
gold: I ’ m afraid I ’ ll be late .

question: I don ’ t know what activity my son should take part in ?
Many children are learning drawing , dancing , swimming and so on in their spare time . You can follow suit .
But each children has his own interest .
gold: Well , you should talk with your son and let him make his own decision .

question: Sorry , honey , something has cropped up again . I have to deal with it . Perhaps I will go to back home till very late .
It's nothing . It's not the first time anyway .
Oh , come on . I will be back as early as possible .
gold: I hope so .

question: Do you have this design with only one breast pocket ?
Let me see.Oh , we have the design but not the same color as this one .
It's a pity . I'm afraid that's too loud for me.Thank you .
gold: You're welcome .

question: How much is a ticket to Edinburgh ?
Single or return ?
A return ticket , please .
gold: A return ticket is forty-six pounds fifty .

question: By the way miss , where is the toilet ?
Toilets are in the rear , I am afraid all the toilets are fully occupied at the moment .
What ? Oh , what we live ! Thank you very much for your help , miss .
gold: You are welcome .

question: I think it is easier to buy a car than to maintain it . What ’ s worse , I just don ’ t trust those vehicle maintenance shops . Sometimes , they overcharge or don ’ t build those parts I have been paying for . Last week , they even tried to persuade me to buy new parts which really need not to be changed . You know , my car is just half a year old and also good brand . I was just wondering about all these .

There are such shops living on selling parts . I don ’ t like their service either . All they want is your money . But in the long run , they will be losing costumers . Anyway , car service business is new in China . We all have to control what they are doing . Otherwise , they will not improve .
Is it possible to make a compliant call to some organization what it ’ s someone gets rip-off .
gold: Yes , there is . Those organizations exist . You always can call a lawyer if you need legal help .

question: I'm afraid I forgot to lock the door .
You're so careless , Billy .
Sorry , Mum , I'll lock it right away .
gold: I've done it for you .

question: Can you put me through to May Flower Restaurant , please ?
Just a second ... Sorry , the line is engaged .
OK , I ’ ll try later . Thanks anyway .
gold: You ’ re welcome .

question: I wonder if I can see your mother , little boy . Is she engaged ?
Engaged ? She ’ s married .
Johnny , I wish you ’ d stop reaching for things . Haven ’ t you a tongue ?
gold: Yes , Mother , but my arm is longer .

question: Hello ! We ’ Ve been waiting for our lunch order for over an hour . Did you forget our order ?
I ’ m sorry , sir . Could you tell me your name and order again , please ? I ’ ll check on the delay .
The name ’ s Stanley Morris and the order was for two chef ’ s salads .
gold: Thank you , Mr . Morris . Please wait one moment and let me check on the order . Would you like anything to drink , sir ? On the house .

question: I'm looking for the produce section , please .
All of the produce is in aisle A .
Are bananas on sale today ?
gold: Here you go . Look in this flyer , or check with the produce person .

question: Where can I find the produce ?
Aisle A is where you'll find all the produce .
What sales do they have today ?
gold: I'm sure something is on sale . Please check with the produce person .

question: What's your major in college ?
I take architecture as my major .
What research are you dealing with now ?
gold: I am dealing with the study of the architecture style of ancient Chinese buildings .

question: Our philosophy teacher is very humorous .
I usually have the wrong notion that he's very serious .
No , not at all.The examples he gives are very interesting .
gold: No wonder when I pass your room , I always hear your laughter .

question: Did you have any kind of punishment in your life and studies ?
Yes , just once .
What was the reason ?
gold: I once played truant when I was in college because I intended to organize a donation activity for the disaster-hit areas in Sichuan .

question: Uh-oh . I'm in trouble .
Why ? What's wrong ?
I just remembered that I've got to give a speech in class today and I forgot to prepare for it .
gold: I guess you'll have to wing it .

question: I've had enough of that !
Why , this is the most interesting film !
I hate the hero.He ' s too cruel .
gold: But it's only a film .

question: It really makes my blood boil when this sort of thing happens . I even want to wring his neck .
Don't be so angry . It's passed anyway .
I can't forget it .
gold: You'd better cool yourself down first .

question: You seem to be in the seventh heaven . What's put you on ?
Sarah and I could see eye to eye with each other .
Did she give up her decision to marry Dick ?
gold: No , I encourage her to go her own way , but she's now having a change of heart .

question: Quite a few times , I had my back to the wall .
Really ? Generally they will turn out to be a good thing .
That ’ s right .
gold: You ’ ll exert all your energy and get out of it .

question: How could you have done that without asking me first ?
I didn't realize you felt so strongly about it .
Well , you should have thought .
gold: I'm sorry . I'll ask next time .

question: I'm afraid I've spilt ink all over the table-cloth .
Oh , never mind about that .
I'm terribly sorry . Won't you let me pay for it ?
gold: No , I won't hear of it .

question: I hear that you have been promoted . Congratulations on your promotion !
Thank you , but I hate having to leave here and working abroad .
When are you going ?
gold: Sometime next month .

question: I think that ’ s settled .
I'm tired of your cut-and-dried opinions . Who do you think you are !
How dare you speak to me like this .
gold: Why not ?

question: Don ’ t be worried . Please sit down and take it easy .
How could I feel easy ? I ’ m really pissed .
But you should avoid finger-pointing when you haven ’ t got the real facts .
gold: Ok . I ’ ll try my best to calm down first .

question: Your knowledge of English is really surprising .
Oh , it's nothing to speak of .
No , seriously . I am impressed .
gold: Thank you . I appreciate the compliment .

question: How would you like your hair cut ?
I want it short .
Then , I'll just trim it .
gold: It will do .

question: I'm sorry for spilling my drink on your rug .
There's no need to apologize .
But I ruined your rug .
gold: Forget it . It was an accident .

question: Do you mind if I get a lift in your car , please ?
I don ’ t see any problem , only the car is a bit old .
Oh you ’ re so kind !
gold: Get in .

question: You look really wiped out ?
I had meetings back to back all morning . And phone rang off the hook from the minute I walked into the office .
Not a good day . I hate to tell you that Mr . Thomas wants to see the profit ’ s statement for new project tomorrow morning .
gold: I can ’ t believe it . I guess I ’ ll be here until 10 again tonight .

question: What a terrible house !
I'm sick of it , too .
The door bell doesn't work , the sink is leaking , there's no hot water , and the building is falling apart !
gold: It's no use complaining.If we had got enough money , we wouldn't put up with it !

question: Crazy ! He locked himself in the room .
I think he was locked in it .
But you can see the key in his hand through the window !
gold: What a strange guy !

question: You are not being a good sport about this .
That's because you cheated .
I never cheat .
gold: Yes , you do .

question: Hurry up . We're going to be late .
I am hurrying .
What are you doing ?
gold: I can't figure out which dress to wear .

question: Well , it was nice meeting you .
Yes , I hope we meet again .
Sure , I'll give you a call .
gold: Okay .

question: Hello , Bob , this is Frank .
I know , we've met .
I didn't know you knew Frank .
gold: Yes , we met last year at a conference .

question: Hey , Bob . Are you getting the feeling you've been here before ?
Yes , I'm sure I've been here before .
Maybe we're walking in circles .
gold: Yes , there's that bar we passed an hour ago .

question: I'm happy to see you again .
Me too .
We should do this more often .
gold: Okay , I'll give you a ring next week .

question: I'm bored and got nothing to do tonight .
How about coming with me to meet my American friends ?
Hey , that sounds great .
gold: Okay , I'll pick you up at eight o'clock .

question: Is the lake very polluted ?
Well , I wouldn't swim in it - but the water is much cleaner than it was a few years ago .
Are local factories allowed to discharge waste water into the lake ?
gold: Yes , but it must be treated in an effluent treatment plant first .

question: I hope the host team loses .
That all depends on how the visiting team shapes .
According to the papers , the visiting side is a strong team in America .
gold: But two players of the team have been booked and one is out .

question: I think he deserved his gold .
Did you see his last dive .
Yes , it's perfect !
gold: He's diving for the gold .

question: Which team has won ?
Neither . The game ended in two all .
But I still think AC milan's defence seems better organized .
gold: But the Brazilian is tougher .

question: Would you allow me to drive your car ?
No problem , but you've got to be careful .
Surely I will .
gold: Here's the key then .

question: So Emily , do you still want to see a movie together this weekend ?
Well , what do you want to see ? I don't think there are many good movies out right now .
Mmmm ... I know ! We can go to a really bad sci-fi movie and sit in the back of the theater and make fun of it . What do you think ?
gold: Now that's a great plan . It's a date !

question: Well now that I know what kind of movies you like , tell me , what's your least favorite kind of movie ?
I don't really like sci-fi movies because they're always really weird .
I know ! I don't get them at all . But wait , isn't ' Terminator ' a sci-fi movie ?
gold: Hmm ... you're right . Well , I guess ' Terminator ' is an exception to the rule .

question: How nice it is here .
You can say that again.The sun is shining and there is a pleasant breeze.It ' s so lovely .
I've heard the weather here is ideal , just like spring most of the year .
gold: That's correct . We have four seasons of spring .

question: What date is it today ?
Today is December 23,2002 .
Oh , the day after tomorrow is Christmas .
gold: Merry Christmas to you !

question: Where is your native place ?
My native place is Shanghai , which is a very beautiful cosmopolitan city .
So are you a local ?
gold: Yes , I am a local resident .

question: Are you sure Lucy has it bad for you ? If she does , she will certainly bend over backwards for you . But if she doesn't , it would be a job to change her .
I don't know whether she has it bad for me , but she enjoys being with me .
And do you really love her ?
gold: I think I do . I don't think I can be happier with another girl .

question: How about going to hear a country-and-western singer tonight ?
I'd enjoy that .
I'll pick you up around 8: 00 .
gold: OK . I'll see you then .

question: Some people are easily flimflammed .
Maybe they are still wet behind ears .
They are blind with bucks . Blind people are more easily conned , fo course .
gold: Sure . Many people , including men and women , and be easily ripped off .

question: Do you know Mark ?
Yeah ! He is a nice guy . He is very helpful and always bends over backward to help those who are in need of help .
Can you introduce him to me ?
gold: Sure .

question: It seems to be clearing up .
It's such a nice change .
I really don't think this weather will last .
gold: Let's just hope it doesn't get cold again .

question: John , my father isn't there at all . Are you kidding ?
Poor fellow ! What's the date today , buddy ?
It's ... OH , it's the first of April , April Fools ' Day .
gold: You forgot all about it , didn't you ?

question: Well , I ’ d better get back to work . I ’ Ve got a ton of stuff on my desk !
Me too . I ’ ll see you after work , huh ?
Yeah , definitely . I was hoping to catch a ride with you .
gold: Sure . Meet me at five .

question: Hey , what's the matter ?
It doesn't matter . I just feel a little dizzy .
Are you sure that this has nothing to do with sleep ?
gold: I don't know .

question: Is this a photo of your family ?
Yes , it is.It was taken just before I was leaving for college .
You look so lovely .
gold: How time flies ! I'll not see twenty again .

question: How is your ankle ?
My what ? Oh , that , right as a trivet .
Please be careful next time .
gold: I will , thank you .

question: Hello , my name is Xu Hua . I'm from Beijing .
Hello , Xu Hua . I'm Paula . I'm American .
Welcome to China , Paula .
gold: Thank you .

question: I heard many stories about your brother .
He's a hero in our town .
What does he look like ? Is he handsome ?
gold: Yes , indeed , People say he's the smartest young man .

question: The city has got a traffic problem .
That means it's developing very fast .
You said it .
gold: Problems are inevitable .

question: He has to deliver letters every day .
Poor man , he must be terribly fed up with it .
Oh , no , he likes the job .
gold: Oh , Really ?
